name: Bookone
tagline: Bookone Generator (Convert Doc, Docx, HTML, PDF, etc. to EPUB).
body:
### Bookone.
Bookone Studio 志在为每个人创新电子书的体验，轻而易举创建电子书，随时随地分享知识。我们喜欢Ted，喜欢Noah Project，前者分享思想，后者让人与生灵万物互联。

We like Ted, We like Noah project, they are the good places to share ideas, to help people reconnect with the natural world.
We create bookone, a software platform to innovate epub experiences, to create ebooks, to share knowledge for everyone.  
```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```


### Authors and Contributors

独乐乐不如众乐乐，书籍带给我们快乐，书籍带给我们知识。

Sharing first. Book gives us joys. Book give us knowledge.

### Support or Contact

如果你能够参与、协助、指导我们，请联系Bookonestudio@qq.com, Wuxi, China.


If you want to help us, please contract bookonestudio@qq.com, Wuxi, China.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
